resources.string: To start staking, create an account on CrowdNode or connect to an existing one.
You have to backup your passphrase in Dash Wallet
You need at least %s Dash on your Dash Wallet
CrowdNode uses this address as your account ID. You will lose access to your funds within this wallet and your CrowdNode account if you lose the passphrase associated to this address.
Very small amounts of Dash will be sent to and from CrowdNode to verify that you are the owner of this wallet address.
All transfers to and from CrowdNode from this device will be performed with the below Dash address from this device.
Backup your passphrase to create a CrowdNode account
If you lose your passphrase for this wallet and lose this device or uninstall Dash Wallet, you will lose access to your funds on CrowdNode and the funds within this wallet.
You have insufficient funds to proceed.
You should have at least %s Dash to proceed with the CrowdNode verification.
Your CrowdNode account is set up and ready to use!
Close and notify when it’s done
We couldn’t create your CrowdNode account.
We couldn’t make a deposit to your CrowdNode account.
We couldn’t withdraw from your CrowdNode account.
Your deposit to CrowdNode is received.
It can take a minute for your balance to be updated.
It can take a minute for your funds to arrive.
Sign up to finish setting up account
Please note that the email is not saved by the Dash Wallet and is only sent to Crowdnode
Why do you need an online account?
If you ever lose your passphrase, you can verify yourself by other means to regain access to your CrowdNode funds.
You can see detailed information about your deposits, withdrawals and reward earnings.
You can change how / when your reward earnings are paid to you.
Here is the Dash address you used in integration with CrowdNode
Wait until the chain is fully synced, so we can review your transaction history. Visit CrowdNode website to log in or sign up.
Become part of a Dash Masternode with CrowdNode
Gain rewards from deposits in Dash Masternodes with as little as 0.5 Dash.
Receive your share of rewards daily.
Sending to Dash Wallet on this device
Deposit at least %s to start earning
First deposit should be more than %s
You start earning if your CrowdNode account has more than %s
How to confirm your API Dash address
Send %s Dash from your primary Dash address that you currently use for your CrowdNode account
to the Dash address designated for your CrowdNode account in the Dash Wallet on this device
We will automatically detect this transaction and transfer the same amount to your CrowdNode account. After that you will be able to make deposits and withdrawals in Dash Wallet on this device.
This QR already contains the payment request for %s Dash
Your CrowdNode address has been validated, but verification is required.
Your CrowdNode address has been confirmed.
Confirmation sent from a wrong primary address
Your primary Dash address that you currently use for your CrowdNode account
Dash address designated for your CrowdNode account in the Dash Wallet on this device
The primary Dash address is missing from your account. Please specify it on the CrowdNode website.
Please wait until your email is processed…
